name: Operative's Constancy
description: An accessory with a Delusion mounted on it. This is source of the FatuiOperative's power.  That said, taking it off would not detract from the fact that said Operativehas physical abilities far beyond that of ordinary humans, forged through longyears of training and combat experience. As for them, they are well-aware thatthey have sacrificed their past, present, and future upon the altar of theFatui's ideal paradise, such that the damage they cause themselves on accountof using a Delusion's power matters not at all.
